abstract: Israeli military says Palestinian gunmen shot two Israeli men as they left spring near Jewish settlement in West Bank, one of whom died in hospital.
lead_paragraph: The attacker opened fire on a civilian vehicle near a Jewish settlement in the occupied West Bank on Friday, Israel’s military said in a statement.

headline.main: Two Israeli Men Are Attacked, and One Killed, Near Settlement in the West Bank
headline.print_headline: Two Israeli Men Are Attacked, and One Is Killed, Near Settlement in West Bank

snippet: The attacker opened fire on a civilian vehicle near a Jewish settlement in the occupied West Bank on Friday, Israel’s military said in a statement.
